job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongTitle Site Reliability EngineerbrbrLocation Beaverton Oregon 97008  Remote OptionbrbrEmployment Type Direct Hire no c2c or sponsorship availablebrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongEdgeLink is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer SRE to join an expanding team focused on connecting business to cloud applications and environments From a skills perspective we are targeting most of the followingbrulliBachelor s degree or equivalent practical experienceliliExperience supporting development environments that include Linux tools Bamboo Puppet Terraform AWS and AzureliliDeep understanding of the UnixLinux operating systems including kernel networking packet flowliliStrong understanding of network fundamentals including tunnelingliliWorking knowledge of SQL databasesliliExperience with algorithms and data structures are a nice to havebrliulEdgelink would like to thank all applicants however only those who qualify for an interview will be contactedbrbrEdgeLink is an equal opportunity employerbrbrJob RequirementsbrbrSRE DevOps Site Reliability CICD Cloud Azure AWS Linux Bamboo Puppet Terraform Unix Networking Tunneling SQL Database Algorithm Data Structure VPNbrbr
